title: It’s not scary, not scary….
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ruby-chan, it’s alright, they’re not scary<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uu, really….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course! Trust me! Look, slowly does it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Slowly…. *Pet Pet*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>See? Alpaca-san is cute right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>*Pet Pet*.... *Pet Pet*.... yeah, they’re cute….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Want to try feeding them? They love green grass so they’ll be happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! I want to try! Alpaca-san, it’s your delicious food~.... Pigi!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wawa, Ruby-chan! Are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Y-, yeah, they just licked me…. I was surprised, but they’re so cute~. I wish we have one at our school too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
